```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
```


```{r}
beaches <- read_csv("sydneybeaches3.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(
  data = beaches,
  mapping = aes(
    x = temperature,
    y = rainfall
  )
) + 
  geom_point(
    mapping = aes(color = season_name),
    size = 4,
    show.legend = FALSE
) + 
  facet_wrap(~ season_name) + # if we don't do this then all groups are on one canvas 
  theme_bw()+ # makes white background and grey gridlines 
  labs(x = "Temperature (C)", 
       y = "Rainfall (mm)",
       title = "Sydney weather by season",
       subtitle = "Data from 2013 to 2018") + 
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 14),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
        strip.text = element_text(size = 12))
```
